item.title: Why Nothing Is Fair in School
item.description: Intro hey, have you ever you think why if student arrived late would get punished but teachers not. look at least in most of the schools in Iran, WE ARE paying a lot of money to the schools so, why are we not paying attention to it or are we ok with that? Main WE ARE PAYING MONEY yes that’s our money which is wasted every single second that teachers are late so we’d better fight for our rights.
